amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to delete sections that allow changes to the 12 hours of regularly scheduled instruction rule and revise incentive compensation provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 107-232 to eliminate the bill's provisions concerning incentive compensation and the 12-hour rule. Under the substitute, the same conditions as presented in the original bill would apply to the 50% rule.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mrs. Mink.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mink amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 99 - 327 (Roll no. 374).
